name: Tall-boi
description:
You are a tiny-boi, you need to eat some green apples in order to grow up, jump and kill the evil thingies at the cave so you can get to the end.

But be carefull, when you kill one of the thingies you get your size subtracted from their size.

# CONTROLS #

Left Arrow/A = Move Left

Right Arrow/D = Move Right

# ASSETS #

All assets and songs done by me using (except the font):

- Pixelorama (Sprites)

- 1BitDragon (Song/SFX)

- Godot Game Engine (Programming)

FONT:

https://www.1001freefonts.com/8-bit-operator.font

Game made for GoGodotJam
